description: Initializes an XGBoost classification model. This component sets up the model structure but does not perform training or handle data splitting. The resulting model can be trained later using ``ml_fit``.

parameters.name: learning_rate
parameters.description: Step size shrinkage used in update to prevent overfitting.

parameters.name: min_child_weight
parameters.description: Minimum sum of instance weight (hessian) needed in a child.

parameters.name: subsample
parameters.description: Subsample ratio of the training instance.

parameters.name: min_split_loss
parameters.description: Minimum loss reduction required to make a further partition on a leaf node of the tree.

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description: A randomization seed to use for reproducibility. If not given or `null`, no seed is used and results may differ on subsequent use.

returns.description: A model object that can be trained using ``ml_fit``.

links.title: Chen and Guestrin (2016), XGBoost: A Scalable Tree Boosting System
